metadata.feature_description: Test interactive UI elements including inline editing, animations, and real-time validation.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click row to expand inline edit form

steps.action: Clicked on 'Number of logins' row in the Influence table
steps.expected: Inline edit form should expand below the clicked row
steps.actual: Inline edit form expanded with Goal Type dropdown, Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value fields, and Save/Cancel buttons

steps.action: Observed edit form expand animation when clicking row
steps.expected: Form should slide down with smooth animation
steps.actual: Form slid down with jQuery slideDown animation (400ms duration as per code)

steps.action: Clicked Cancel button to collapse the edit form
steps.expected: Form should slide up with smooth animation
steps.actual: Form slid up with jQuery slideUp animation (200ms duration as per code)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test Save button text changes to Saving

steps.action: Expanded edit form and clicked Save button with valid data
steps.expected: Save button text should change to 'Saving...' during save operation
steps.actual: Code review confirms button changes to 'Saving...' (line 107, 426 in CommunitySettings.js). Change is brief due to fast async operation. Save completed successfully with toast notification.

steps.action: Set Min Value to 200 and Max Value to 100 (invalid: min > max), then clicked Save
steps.expected: Validation should prevent save and show error feedback
steps.actual: Save was blocked by validation. Red error indicator appeared near the invalid field.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test error message display next to invalid fields

steps.action: Triggered validation error with Min Value > Max Value
steps.expected: Error message/indicator should display next to the invalid field
steps.actual: Red error tooltip/indicator displayed between the Value and Min Value fields showing validation failure

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify confirmation dialog for delete operations

steps.action: Clicked Remove (delete) button on 'The number of posts the user has authored' row
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear asking to confirm deletion
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with warning icon, message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?', and Cancel/Delete buttons

steps.action: Saved an influence goal with valid data
steps.expected: Toast notification should appear confirming success
steps.actual: Toast notification appeared with Success icon and message 'Item successfully saved.' (confirmed in page snapshot)

observations: Tab switching between Settings and Influence: Code review and UI inspection confirmed there are NO tabs in the Community Settings panel. Both 'Influence' and 'Miscellaneous Community Settings' are sections displayed on the same page, not separate tabs to switch between.
Test responsive layout: Not tested per Medium priority guidelines (edge case testing not required).
Keyboard navigation and accessibility: Not tested per Medium priority guidelines (edge case testing not required).

Save button 'Saving...' text change: While code clearly shows the button text changes to 'Saving...' during async operations (CommunitySettings.js lines 107, 426), the visual change is too brief to capture in screenshot due to fast server response.
